name: AKIN
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Have easy and seamless connectivity with your AKIN products through your smart phone, Amazon Alexa.

1. Download AKIN app in android or ios app market. 
2. Register an AKIN account in the app. 
3. Place your AKIN product in power. Connect the AKIN product to the AKIN app you just registered in. 
4. Configure the products in the app. You may change the name of the product to set it to appropriate functions (e.g. Kitchen Lights, Bedroom Lamps, etc.) 
5.Download Amazon "Alexa" app from android,ios or Amazon app market;
6. Configure Echo with "Alexa" app;
7. Search " AKIN" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category;
8. Click Enable skill of " AKIN", and you'll be navigated to AKIN login page;
9.Input your AKIN account username and password, you'll be redirect to the success page;
10 .Now all setup is finished. Start exploring different functions in the AKIN app. Set schedule, select from the 16M+ colors, or sync with your Amazon Alexa for Voice Control.
You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
“Alexa, turn on kitchen light"
“Alexa, turn off kitchen light"
“Alexa, dim livingroom light"
“Alexa, brighten livingroom light"
“Alexa, set the livingroom light to 20 percent"
“Alexa, set bedroom light to Blue"
